segments.text: My gaze returns to the ceaseless flow of water from the kitchen sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is definitely turned on, gushing water into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's no plug visible, but the drain simply isn't taking anything away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water crests over the front edge of the sink in a continuous, mesmerizing sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It cascades down the simple cabinet doors below, creating dark streaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor grows wider, reflecting the overhead light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised the woman hasn't heard the distinct sound of the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She continues to polish her plate with such an intense, singular focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable how unaware she remains of her immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness to such a significant mess is rather unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The waste of water itself is quite a nuisance to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR
